page.title: 10Home Life
page.content: The typical person from Cowdenbeath are well awake at about 07.30 Breakfast is cooked and eaten in the home. The meal usually consists of cereal food, milk and sugar, toast and tea or coffee. If the person is not unemployed his work usually starts between 7-9 am. People travel to work by bus, train or car. Some may even walk. Dinner is eaten between 12-2 pm. Most people eat in cafes, canteens etc. This is time to meet friends and relax. People go back to work in the afternoon. Tea is cooked at home (on cooker). The meal has veg, potatoes and meat. Soup before or pudding after may also be served. TV provides entertainment, sport,etc. Bedtime is around about 11.30 for most people.
